name: py-certifi
description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy
dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice

dependent_to.name: py-dulwich
dependent_to.description:
Dulwich aims to provide an interface to Git repos (both local and
remote) that doesn't call out to Git directory, but instead uses pure
Python.

dependent_to.name: py-py2neo
dependent_to.description:
Py2neo is a client library and toolkit for working with Neo4j from
within Python applications and from the command line.

dependent_to.name: py-httpcore
dependent_to.description:
The HTTP Core package provides a minimal low-level HTTP client, which
does one thing only. Sending HTTP requests.

dependent_to.name: py-minio
dependent_to.description:
MinIO Python SDK is Simple Storage Service (aka S3) client to perform
bucket and object operations to any Amazon S3 compatible object storage
service.

dependent_to.name: py-pyproj
dependent_to.description:
Python interface to PROJ (cartographic projections and coordinate
transformations library).

dependent_to.name: py-kaggle
dependent_to.description:
Official API for https://www.kaggle.com, accessible using a command line
tool implemented in Python. Beta release - Kaggle reserves the right to
modify the API functionality currently offered.

dependent_to.name: py-rasterio
dependent_to.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.

dependent_to.name: py-httpx
dependent_to.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-requests
dependent_to.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: py-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: Official Python client library for kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-sphobjinv
dependent_to.description: Sphinx objects.inv Inspection/Manipulation Tool.

dependent_to.name: py-fiona
dependent_to.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.

dependent_to.name: py-tornado
dependent_to.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependent_to.name: py-msrest
dependent_to.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime.

dependent_to.name: py-urllib3
dependent_to.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependent_to.name: mercurial
dependent_to.description: Mercurial is a free, distributed source control management tool.

dependent_to.name: py-python-certifi-win32
dependent_to.description:
This package patches certifi at runtime to also include certificates
from the windows certificate store.
